dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Real May heat has finally arrived in Kazakhstan after those chilly nights.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Real May heat has finally arrived in Kazakhstan after those chilly nights.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After chilly nights, real May warmth has arrived in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's hitting like 33 degrees Celsius in Astana and Almaty, which is pretty intense for this time of year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's hitting like thirty three degrees Celsius in Astana and Almaty, which is pretty intense for this time of year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperatures in Astana and Almaty are expected to reach up to 33ÂC, though thunderstorms and hail are still possible during this period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But you know, they're still saying thunderstorms and hail are possible, so it's not all sunshine, um, literally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But you know, they're still saying thunderstorms and hail are possible, so it's not all sunshine, um, literally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperatures in Astana and Almaty are expected to reach up to 33ÂC, though thunderstorms and hail are still possible during this period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, the forecast for May 9th looks a bit rough—gusts up to 20 meters per second in some areas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, the forecast for May ninth looks a bit rough-gusts up to twenty meters per second in some areas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Southwesterly wind at 9"14 m/s, with gusts up to 15"20 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's serious wind. I mean, you wouldn't wanna be caught outside without an umbrella that day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's serious wind. I mean, you wouldn't wanna be caught outside without an umbrella that day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But the 7th and 8th sound lovely though—partly cloudy, no rain, perfect for being outdoors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the seventh and eighth sound lovely though-partly cloudy, no rain, perfect for being outdoors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 7: Partly cloudy, no precipitation. May 8: Partly cloudy, no precipitation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Temperatures up to 33 degrees on the 8th—that's almost summer weather. Don't forget your hat and water, like they said.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Temperatures up to thirty three degrees on the eighth-that's almost summer weather. Don't forget your hat and water, like they said.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 8: Partly cloudy, no precipitation. Wind shifting from southeast to southwest at 3"8 m/s. Temperatures: +12¦+14ÂC at night, +28¦+30ÂC during the day. Expect a summer-like day " don't forget a hat and water.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's all because of that southern cyclone moving in, influencing things across the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all because of that southern cyclone moving in, influencing things across the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, forecasters reported that in the coming days Kazakhstan's weather will be influenced by a southern cyclone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the western and northern parts are getting hit first with rain and possible hail, then it shifts central and east.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the western and northern parts are getting hit first with rain and possible hail, then it shifts central and east.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: From May 6"8, rain, thunderstorms, and in some places hail are expected in the western, northwestern, and northern parts of the country, and from May 8 " in central, eastern, and southern regions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Kind of a mixed bag, really. Some great days, some you gotta be careful.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kind of a mixed bag, really. Some great days, some you gotta be careful.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Still, after a cold spell, I bet people there are happy to feel that warmth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, after a cold spell, I bet people there are happy to feel that warmth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Just gotta keep an eye on those weather alerts, especially by the 9th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Just gotta keep an eye on those weather alerts, especially by the ninth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unstable weather expected " keep an eye on weather alerts.
